titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require a rollcall vote on the passage of bills making appropriations and bills providing revenue.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends rule XV of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the House from passing or adopting any bill or joint resolution making appropriations or increasing revenues except by a rollcall vote.
